message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $150. I think you'll find it's a steal at this rate considering its value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I'm willing to pay up to $120 for the product.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  How about we split the difference and settle at $135? This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still think I can find a better deal. I am willing to pay $125 for the product.
